description: Allows the user to shrink down to 5mm in height or return to their original size, or any size in between. The user maintains their full strength regardless of size. The fruit permanently changes the user's default size to approximately the height of two human hands.

users.circumstances: Lily, born as a giant, ate the Mini Mini no Mi which allows her to change her size at will.

abilityReveals.description: Lily changes from her miniature form back to her original giant size, maintaining full giant strength.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used during combat and rescue operations in the Z's Ambition Arc.

abilityReveals.description: User can shrink down to 5mm or grow to giant size, with the ability to choose any size in between.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Lily uses this to infiltrate enemy positions and surprise opponents.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Permanent size change - default size becomes miniature
weaknesses.description: The fruit permanently changes the user's default size to about the height of two human hands. If the fruit's powers are negated (such as when falling in the sea), the user reverts to this miniature form rather than their original size.

strengths.strength: Strength remains constant regardless of size
strengths.description: User maintains their full giant strength even when shrunk to 5mm, making them incredibly dangerous at small size.
The fruit's power extends to the user's clothing and weapons, which change size to match the user.

name.japanese: 不明なアルパカのゾオン

description: An unnamed Zoan Devil Fruit that allows an inanimate object (a bazooka) to transform into an alpaca or alpaca-bazooka hybrid form. Notably, this is the first inanimate object shown to use Armament Haki.

users.circumstances: Alpacacino is a bazooka that 'ate' an unnamed Zoan Devil Fruit, allowing it to transform into a white alpaca.

abilityReveals.description: The bazooka can transform into a white alpaca with a metal band around its neck.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Alpacacino transforms between bazooka and alpaca forms during combat.

abilityReveals.description: Alpacacino can fire cannonballs imbued with Armament Haki, allowing them to damage Devil Fruit users like Luffy.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Alpacacino fires Haki-enhanced cannonballs at Marine ships and the Straw Hats.

abilityReveals.description: Alpacacino can willingly shoot cannonballs from his mouth without needing to be fired manually.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used during the attack on Marine forces.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - sea water and seastone

strengths.strength: First inanimate object to use Haki
strengths.description: Alpacacino is the first non-canon inanimate object shown capable of using Armament Haki to enhance ammunition.

strengths.strength: Dual functionality as companion and weapon
strengths.description: Can serve as both a loyal companion in alpaca form and a powerful weapon in bazooka form.
